headline: Coterra stock rises, Devon falls following report on merger talks
summary: Investing.com -- Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) stock rose 4% Thursday while Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE:DVN) shares fell 1.5% following reports that the two shale producers are in talks about a potential merger that would create one of the largest oil and gas companies in the U.S.

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Devon Energy (DVN) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
